channel.title: Help me!
channel.description:
Hello, how to make pvp timer when somewane runs out of wilderness you still got like 10 seconds when he is out wildy how to add Dark Bow spec on dark bow And Can somewane help me with getting gwd models and maybe barrelchest boss models and i need a good item command to spawn need to make alot of items unspawnable! and need to know how to make that only owners can spawn those unspawnable items :D so like everyone can spawn but uhm normal players cant spawn santa hats and owner can :p
Thanks!!!

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“P R 0 Rusher, post:3, topic:368278”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=464431.msg3396641#msg3396641 date=1289507507]
for the making items unspawnable

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


search models section for gwd models etc
you could just make it so you require to be a owner to wear rares like santa hats…

also what base is this?
i just assumed is delta
[/quote]

Ye its delta but some items i want that normal players can spawn so everyone can use “Item” command but that owner only can spawn rares[/quote]
like i said, you could just make it so only owners can wear it, but thats just what i would do.

Read full topic
